resources.string: Sorry, there has been an error processing your request.
Sorry, something gone wrong while processing the request for your access token
Sorry, you must be connected to a network to let Shuffler work
You have no playlists in your Spotify account
Shuffler is getting tracks from all your playlists. It may take a while, please wait
The enqueueing service has been launched. Please, DO NOT CLOSE THE PROCESS from the recent apps, otherwise the enqueueing task will be close as well
Sorry. You need a premium subscription to Spotify in order to have on demand playback capabilities. To make Shuffler work properly, login with a Spotify premium account.
Shuffler is checking whether your Spotify account has a premium subscription
Shuffler activated a service to continuously update your Spotify queue. The service will close itself when all tracks have been enqueued once.
